SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.IconStyleH: Select the type of icon you want
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.autoIconH: Overrides whatever icon is selected above.
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.iconScaleH: Initial scale setting for new icons.  1 = one grid square. Only applies on initial creation
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.uploadPathH: Path to store newly created icons in
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.fontFamilyH: Font family name from fonts.google.com. Leave blank for stock font
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.rebuildH: This will look for all note icons in the world, and if they are in auto mode, rebuild the images.  This can take a while if you have lots of map notes. It will automatically reload when complete.
AutoJournalIcon.partialrebuild: Rebuild all icons, keeping their settings
AutoJournalIcon.fullrebuild: Rebuild all icons, overriding settings to global values
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.folderIconH: Set default icon name based on the folder name. e.g. Journals in a folder called 'Village' would get the village icon by default
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.reg_alpha_space: A letter followed by a space (Q )
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.reg_alpha_dot: A letter followed by a period (Z.)
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.reg_custom_hint: * No need for leading or trailing /. * Start with ^ to match off the first character of the jounal title * Can have multiple values | separated. * ^\d.\d|^[a-zA-Z].\d{1,2}
